website_summaries.verdict: A good value for a gel-type cleanser that hydrates well.
pros: Treats the face gently and leaves it soft
Those with sensitive skin report no breakouts with this cleanser
No scent, so comfortable for smell-sensitive customers
cons: Doesn’t do a great job of removing make-up

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of hesitant at first because the texture is like lotion, but don’t let it fool you! It’s such a great face wash! I have struggled with my acne for years and have tried a billion different products and none of them worked like this one. It took about a month of consistent use but it made my skin look almost flawless. I’m not wearing makeup in either pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Illegitimate Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I got from Amazon, but it is not CeraVe. I have been using this product for 6 years, and thought I'd save some money by ordering from Amazon instead of purchasing at my local Ulta. 1. It smells different. 2. It burned like hell (CeraVe has NEVER burned my skin). 3. It left my face squeaky clean (CeraVe never dries out my skin). 4. The packaging does not match my last bottle, which I purchased from a local pharmacy. 5. The font on the Amazon bottle is different from the CeraVe logo, and is missing the trademark icon, which they put on EVERY instance where their name is used.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean well.....
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this is like lotion, truthfully is fragrance free as advertised. My problem is that it doesn't cleanse well. After the first wash, I still visibly have makeup on my skin. After the second, I still have makeup on a cotton pad with toner applied. It takes three full washes to get all of the makeup off, and I am only wearing a light foundation with powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was too hydrating for me. I didn't feel ...
customer_reviews.text: This was too hydrating for me. I didn't feel clean after washing my face with it and it left a greasy feel. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: forever happy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean your face.
customer_reviews.text: I have normal to slightly oily skin but in the winter I have very dry skin and some facial eczema. I used this product for a week during the winter. It honestly feels like your cleaning your face with hand lotion. And my face wasn't fresh and clean after using the product. It still felt oily in my T zone. I won't be using this again,
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  K

customer_reviews.title: Burned like hell
customer_reviews.text: This supposedly gentle cleanser burned like crazy when I put it on. I did this on 3 separate occasions with no other product on my face and it happened all 3 times. I didn't want to break out so I washed it off immediately and gave it to my husband instead. Not good for even mildly sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not that hydrating
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent in the summer, but in the winter it did me no favors. Face feels and looks better just washing with water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t feel like it’s cleaning very well
customer_reviews.text: It’s too thick on the skin. It doesn’t feel like it’s cleaning very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean. Makeup still in place.
customer_reviews.text: The sole purpose of me buying this was for makeup and oil removal without stripping my skin of moisture. It actually doesn’t strip anything not even what it’s supposed to strip away. Makeup was still left on my face even after washing it twice with this cleanser. This would be good for someone that doesn’t wear makeup, but I would still not recommend using it then because it seems like it will leave buildup on your face with time. That will then cause allergies in the long run. Might be better just to pick another cleanser that actually cleans instead of sitting on your face like a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara B.

customer_reviews.title: for clear, hydrated skin use this!
customer_reviews.text: bought this from Amazon a few weeks ago, I had used Aveeno face wash before this, my skin isn’t oily & sometimes “oil free” face washes make my skin extra dry so I decided to give this a try and it has not dried, or made me breakout at all. I usually use between half a pump or a full pump (picture shown of one FULL pump) and it’s plenty, very gentle on my sensitive skin. I reccomend this to all of my family & friends. I won’t ever use another facewash again. I also use Cerave body wash & lotion! Con: feels like conditioner is on my face texture wise
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rush

customer_reviews.title: Product has parabens
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this product to replace my Cetaphil, after learning parabens are a no no, and this product is advertised as "fragrance-free and PARABEN FREE". It in fact has both Methylparaben and Propylparaben!! I'm assuming this must be an older product, and Cerave changed their formulation but this seller has old product. Regardless, this is false advertising, no good! Wish I could have given 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KPG

customer_reviews.title: Contains products with high toxicity
customer_reviews.text: I liked this until I looked into the ingredients and found several ingredients which were high in toxicity. See pic of ingredients or go on the Think Dirty app. Threw it out due to untrustworthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: TheTrueMe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean and will make your face look gross
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin, oily and dry. This is like lotion, is moisturizing but doesn't clean at all. Within a week of using this my skin was like a mountain range. Disgusting. As soon as I switched back to purpose cleanser my skin immediately started to look better. DO NOT buy this if you are oily, dry or acne prone. Actually dont buy this at all
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Caused a major breakout!
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! Made me completely break out! I’ve been using it for about a month and thought it was my skin getting used to it after the first pimple but it’s getting worse BY THE DAY. It’s been YEARS since I’ve had a horrible breakout and the only thing I’ve changed is using this cleanser. I have huge acne on my chin and cheek and by my lips! Never before! I’m so irritated and they hurt. Will not be using again. Ugh. My family is shocked since I never break out.
customer_reviews.author: D Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this. As I’m always looking for affordable skin care, and this was recommended. But this DOES NOT take off makeup well. I washed my face twice, for at least 60 seconds both times, and once I put toner on you can see there was still makeup present. I’m definitely disappointed and I thought I was going to find a new holy grail face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Santoy

customer_reviews.title: Mild, non-drying favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: The CeraVe cleanser has been my favorite for a few years now because it's so gentle, non-irritating, and keeps my skin from drying out. While it may not have any specialized benefits, it works well as a general hydrating facial cleanser. Just to be clear, this cleanser isn't meant to remove a full face of heavy makeup - it's meant to be a daily cleanser after makeup removal. Other cleansers have stripped my skin too much and have dried me out, but this one never does. It's really become the core of my skincare routine.
customer_reviews.author: Emi A

customer_reviews.title: Great for my oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a few weeks now. Because I have oily skin, I used to avoid overly hydrating skin care products. Turns out that was a mistake.....for me. Now that I’m treating my skin in a more gentle manner, my oil production has significantly decreased, and my overall skin health is much much better. I didn’t realize how dehydrated my skin actually was due to all the oil I was producing. I don’t think my skin has ever been this healthy now that I’m using the CeraVe cleanser and moisturizer. I’m WAY less oily now!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brinkerhoff

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Coming from some one who always felt like I needed to buy high end and expensive skin care products, I wish I would have tried this LONG ago. Truly in my opinion, nothing beats this stuff. My acne prone skin loves this moisturizing cleanser. My skin has never looked healthier. I suffer from acne breaks outs with very dry surface skin, yet an oily t-zone. I use this product with neutrogena oil free sensitive moisturizer and tretinoin (for acne/ anti-aging). My skin looks better than it ever has. And my routine is cheaper than it’s ever been.
customer_reviews.author: Blaike franklin

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: The 19 oz version that I purchased recently is fake. The smell and consistency are different. Also, the “Reserved” symbol behind the brand name is missing on the side of the bottle. Amazon needs to do better. This is the second fake beauty product that I’ve received recently.
customer_reviews.author: nogueira

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser and it was recommended to me by my dermatologist. She told me not to bother spending a lot of money on high-priced creams when this has the right anti-aging ingredients at a very affordable price. I keep one in the shower and one under the sink. It's creamy but light and not greasy. It rinses off easily.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Went from 2-3 blemishes a month to pizza face cystic acne in a week.
customer_reviews.text: I guess this product works for some people, but not for me. I wanted a different cleanser that would even my skin tone and help with dry winter skin. This was definitely not it. I went to having a very mild case of winter dry skin and acne to full blown teenager breakout within 3 days of using this product. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It actually dried my skin out more
customer_reviews.text: It's been cold out so skin gets a little dry especially in my face from the blistering wind. I've been using this wash for a couple days and my face feels drier after using it. It didnt give me a clean feeling like soaps are suppose to. It's only drier where I only applied the cleanser because I used my body wash as a control on half my face and cleanser on the other. Let's just say half my face feels like a soft sandpaper now and my skin is not sensitive and has never reacted like this to other facial soaps
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECCOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Try this out. Dermatologists recommend it for a reason. We have a tendency to want to go for things that look fancy or for the products in Sephora or Ulta or the Department stores. Trust me I'm guilty as well. But, not when it comes to my skin care. When it comes to skincare I lean more towards the recommendations of dermatologists and estheticians. I've received more "drugstore" recommendations than anything and CeraVe comes HIGHLY recommended! I'm 54 years old and I am so happy with my skin that I go out with NO MAKE-UP! just moisturiser and sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Qmnauni3

customer_reviews.title: Irritated Skin Rash
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. I have extremely dry sensitive fair skin and this wash made my skin very irritated and red. I don’t know what exactly caused it, if there’s a specific chemical or just a general reaction from the face wash, but the redness took a few hours to clear up. Will discontinue use! Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.A

customer_reviews.title: Really improves skin hydration and removes all makeup and dirt
customer_reviews.text: I live in an extremely dry climate and have struggled with adult acne. Using harsh acne washes dried out my skin even further and I didn't realize I was making it worse! Since switching to this moisturizing cleanser my skin tone and texture has improved DRAMATICALLY and my dehydrated skin is no longer so thirsty. It easily takes off all my makeup and leaves my skin feeling soft afterwards. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: snkravitz

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely great soap for people with skin issues (beside acne) -
customer_reviews.text: This is great for dry skin issue's!! like eczema or psoriasis. Over the winter I developed eczema and I didn't know what to do about it. I asked my FB friend's and this was mentioned. I'm happy to report back that I have found it to be gentle yet effective. It smells fresh and definitely does the job without making my face all greasy. I would recommend this lotion soap to anyone looking for something maintainable, that works very well for sensitive skin as well as dry skin. I'd give it 10 stars! Thanks for making this accessible!
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Burns and stings my face
customer_reviews.text: I have bought cerave hydrating moisturizer for a couple years now and used to love it because it made my skin feel so soft. But the most recent bottle I purchased back in July stings and burns my face terribly! Then I saw a report that the company had been bought by Loreal recently and changed up the formula some, so it makes sense I guess. This product literally hurts my face now and I have discontinued using it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Giles

customer_reviews.title: For dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the reviews say it didn’t work for them, well this is for people with dry skin I myself have eczema on my face so my dermatologist recommended I use this and it is the only thing that doesn’t have me break out and keeps my face mostuirzed. This won’t work on non dry skin. And you have to wash your face for more than 30 second s for makeup to come off because it always gets my makeup off
customer_reviews.author: Brittney mars

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the feel, but works okay.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the reviews closely enough before I purchased it. I use CeraVe face moisturizer and like it. This face wash feels like I'm washing my face with the moisturizer. It feels like lotion as you wash. There is no lather, just lotion. After trying it out I read the comments more closely and I see that others have said the same thing. That's my fault. I ordered the foaming face wash by CeraVe and I like it much better. Just be aware that it doesn't lather, foam or feel any different than washing your face with lotion before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: When you realize your facial cleansing product is no longer right for your face....
customer_reviews.text: One day I looked at the cleanser I’d used for years, normal to oily skin, and I realized that neither one fit my facial description anymore. I had matured, and so did my skin. I needed to treat it gently, and not strip it of any moisture it had. My facial skin needed to be pampered. I read the rave reviews for CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash and tried it. It went on without water and felt soft, soothing and terrific. I used a wash clothe to gently remove it and all my makeup. My skin felt rehydrated after using it and I have definitely found my new facial cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: EmmagirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: gentle and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: update: I have been using this for a month and my skin looks so good! i have dealt with acne for a while and every time I would clear up, within a couple days another flare up would occur. Since using this daily, I have seen a big difference in my skin and my acne. I love this face wash, so refreshing and really works! Very refreshing, goes on gently but feels really good. Only been using a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Received faulty product - extremely watery texture
customer_reviews.text: This product is, unfortunately, nearly unusable due to the extremely watery texture. I can barely get my hands up to my face without all of it running off between my fingers and over the sides of my palms. I believe I received a faulty product, because I know the texture should be thicker than this. I am pregnant and don't feel safe going to the post office to mail the product back. I am hoping for a replacement so I can use this face wash normally! There was no way to contact the seller so I am leaving this review and hoping they reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Caused breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Just bad all around. I was looking for a more cost-effective option for my face wash and moisturizer. Less than a week using this product I started having breakouts which I haven't had in years. An odd residue left on skin after washing. There are some reports that this may not be the official product that Amazon is selling. I would hope it is not just by the quality. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: D Little

customer_reviews.title: Illegitimate
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to actually use this product because I am not sure what is truly in it or where it came from. It doesn't have the trademark icon, and is not the real CeraVe.
customer_reviews.author: aschurg

customer_reviews.title: Not the real brand
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt appear to be the real brand. The one I've already purchased from Walmart has the trademark symbol after the brand name. Will be returning. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cleanser. I have combination skin, and this doesn't strip the dry parts but doesn't make the oily parts too oily. And NO SCENT. My eyes are really sensitive to fragrance, and this doesn't bother them at all, even when I wash right over my eye lids to get the last little bits of makeup off (maybe that's not recommended by the manufacturer, idk, but it works for me!)
customer_reviews.author: Michayla

customer_reviews.title: My skin broke out with this face wash
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this face wash broke my skin out in rashes. I had no idea why my face would keep getting a rash, but as soon as I stopped using this, it was gone. It may work wonders for others, but not for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Candra Lessing

customer_reviews.title: Counterbalances my prescription skin meds
customer_reviews.text: Prescription retenoids were making my once-oily skin dry to the point of peeling, so my dermatologist suggested I try this cleanser. I didn't immediately notice a big difference, but after a week or so of use my dryness definitely eased up. I've been using this for almost a year now and it still seems to be good for me—effective cleansing, no irritation, no dry patches. There are a LOT of ingredients listed in this cleanser, so I'm betting it has a decent chance to cause problems for people who have sensitive skin. I have friends who say they absolutely cannot use this product (they swear by Cetaphil instead). Patch-test and then work it into your skin routine slowly!
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, my sister says I'm 'aging backwards'!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic! As a male, I've never used a facial cleanser before, but I saw this mentioned on Reddit so figured I'd give it a shot. It does tend to make my face a bit oily several hours after use, but aside from that, everyone keeps telling me I look younger after I began using it. Several female friends have told me they're jealous of my skin, which is a fantastic compliment. Give it a shot, how it works for you. I use it just once per day after I shower and it seems to be doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Umber

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want white towels anyway . . .
customer_reviews.text: What a let down! It removes no make-up whatsoever and doesn't clean your skin. I've used the regular Ceravae for years and thought I'd try this one because my skin has been dry lately. It basically just pushed the make-up around my face, but never washed it off. I don't contour or wear heavy eye make-up; I wear the normal amount. This is a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: MGeis

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out in new places
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing for my current breakouts and instead added insult to injury... after using this for two weeks I have developed new very red pimples on my cheeks. I never have pimples there! I gave it two weeks and I am DONE with it! I hate to say it but there is a reason why it's so cheap compared to products like Tata Harper.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Drying, Not-So-Nice Scent, Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by my dermatologist. I have used CeraVe since October, and I simply don’t think this product works. (The moisturizing cream can be emollient, but causes breakouts for me.) This product in particular does not moisturize at all. My face is more dry after I use this wash. While the scent is not exactly what I’d call unpleasant, I don’t think it is a nice fragrance. More utilitarian. Unfortunately, that scent isn’t something I can rationalize, since the product doesn’t do its job or live up to its claims. All of that combined with the fact that it is expensive (not just on Amazon, but anywhere) means I won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nox

customer_reviews.title: Texture feels good
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this moisturizer feels on your skin. It goes on very smooth and easily. Its not thick or gunky. Its easy to wash off and I never feel like I have any left over residue. Although the product says its super moisturizing, I dont see it being different from the blue version(foaming cleanser) when it comes to moisturizing. They seem around the same. I have really sensitive and very dry skin. I wasnt expecting a miracle honestly. Its a good product, but you definitely need to have a good moisturizer to put on afterwards if you have dry skin like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannel M.

customer_reviews.title: *6 MONTH UPDATE*
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY thing that has ever helped my acne!! (Including hormonal acne!) I have been put on many prescriptions, birth control, tried so many products but this is it. I still get breakouts during my cycle but this always clears them up right after and prevents more scarring. I've never felt this confident in my life. I use this once in the morning, once at night, and a light moisturizer and my face is so smooth, hydrated, and healthy c': and my scarring is fiiinally fading after 7 years of cystic acne
customer_reviews.author: Indra

customer_reviews.title: Fresh skin feeling
customer_reviews.text: For me, this product isn't the best for removing my makeup (perhaps it's because of the type of makeup I use?) but it is gentle on my skin which is important for my skin needs. I was pleasantly surprised how good my skin felt, particularly my face, after using this. My face felt noticeably fresher, softer and just overall, really good. I haven't gotten any negative reactions from using this and it seems to help the dry spots on my face; in fact, I've had less peeling skin since using this. So far I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sef Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! NON LEGIT SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Like other buyers say this product feels like lotion, and does not clean your face at all! I think the seller might have just put some non scenting lotion in the bottle because it's horrible. Don't waste your money, get it from the store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, as it is so highly recommended by various skin care professionals on the internet. However, this "non-comedogenic" face wash clogged the pores on my chin to the point that I had a huge acne breakout and I am 52 years old! The problem is, it never washed off completely and I felt like I had a fine film remaining, even after diligently rinsing in the shower for over 3 minutes. I am giving it 2 stars only because it did not dry out my skin the way most washes do, so at least that part was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: do
customer_reviews.text: While it is very moisturizing and rinses well, it does not remove the slightest amount of makeup, which makes you wonder how clean it makes your face. Secondly, I might get a pimple once or twice a month, if at all. However, after using this for a week, many pimples popped up on my chin/around my mouth. I discontinued it and the acne went away. Because I love CeraVe's other products, I tried again after three weeks. Same thing happened. Broke out around my chin. My skin is normal. I was disappointed, especially as it is not cheap and I have to throw away the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: kelliwithani

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied thirsty skin
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday, and I only got it because my dermatologist told me to use it. It’s very moisturizing and cream based which I’m not used to because I like to have that tight skin feeling after I wash my face so it’s “clean” but lately my skin has been chapped and with 2 uses, I could immediately tell that it was hydrating. I AM, however, giving it 3 stars because the bottle cover wouldn’t open and then when it did, it was broken. So now I have to fix the pump every time I want to use it and that’s annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alishiba balouch

customer_reviews.title: No tugging feeling
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very prone to over-drying after face washing. I’ve used many products that claim to not have that tugging feeling after cleansing but have not found one that worked for me until I came across this! The pump bottle makes it easy to use each day. There is not a strong scent to this, which is a good thing in my book. Very smooth feeling when washing my face, as if I’m using lotion to wash my face. The best part is that this doesn’t cause the tugging feeling! I am on my second bottle of this and I have no intention on switching products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cause severe outbreak
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin whatsoever so I figured I’d try this with my cerave lotion I use. The wash has caused my face to break out with probably the worst breakout I’ve ever had and that includes throughout puberty. Absolutely horrific.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The hype is real!
customer_reviews.text: Because of tik tok, I bought a few items from Cerave and I love everything so far. This cleanser is super gentle for my sensitive/acne-prone skin and I haven't broken out from it. I have nothing bad to say about it... yet.... If I do, I will come back and tell yall the tea later.
customer_reviews.author: Nam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Another “Tik Tok made me buy it”. After seeing a video, I decided to try it as the price was right. I don’t have terrible skin, but I have occasional breakouts and this face wash has cleared up my skin in just a few says. I highly recommend this product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good for us guys as well.
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking face care seriously at the experienced age of 54. Have always been blessed with a youthful appearance, but age and regular sun exposure have started to show their affects. After doing quite a bit of research, CeraVe's Hydrating Face Wash seemed like a solid starting point without breaking the bank. Have been pleasantly surprised with the results, even after just 5 short days of use. Been using it morning and night, have had no irritation and have noticed a more even skin tone. This will definitely be part of my routine going forward. Guess an old dog CAN learn new tricks on occasion lol.
customer_reviews.author: FlBoy84

customer_reviews.title: Severely burned and dried out my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've been seeing reviews about this product being fake from Amazon so I guess they gave me a fake product instead of the real Cera Ve. I do not have sensitive skin and it burned after using it and made some burn marks and very raw red marks on my skin. Also, it made my skin completely dry! So dry that my skin is flaking off and very rough to the touch. I used nothing but Cera Ve on my face for a couple of days and it did that. Do NOT buy this product from Amazon since there is a bunch of people, including me having bad experiences from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annika

customer_reviews.title: terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very dissatisfied with this purchase I made for her to try and clear up her skin. Her skin is extremely sensitive and she watched numerous videos saying that was for sensitive skin so she was willing to try. Her skin became worse in many spots and even began to bleed and peel in some. Terrible experience for us and an expensive lesson for her to learn
customer_reviews.author: Tomika Coffey

customer_reviews.title: A must have for rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, this is the best line for rosacea. I have tried all kinds of expensive things, but this is the best. Non-drying, non-irritating and affordable. Ceramides are very good for the skin and this is the only brand that includes them and is reasonably priced. Love this cleanser, the daytime lotion as well as the night cream. Thank you Cerave!
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Woman

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly doesn't irritate, but I never felt like I got fully clean, or like it fully rinsed off. If it got on my lips at all, it left a filmy, oily sensation that drove me up a wall. As a skincare junkie, I hate myself for saying it, but I preferred the Glossier cleanser to this (hides head in hands). If you need something super gentle and aren't really looking to get *super-clean* (say, an AM cleanse), this could do. The ingredients list is impeccable, but it just didn't do anything helpful for me.
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy I can finally wash my face without the dry tight feeling afterwards. After having my first baby my skin was never the same, my normal cleanser was leaving my skin dry, flaky and worst of all itchy! I tried multiple different products from high end facial washer to natural to generic and nothing was working, everything was upsetting my newly sensitive skin. Read reviews on this cleanser and decided what the heck, glad I did because after the first use my skin was feeling so much better and moisturized! After the second use my skin was no longer itchy. I would definitely recommend for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: perla

customer_reviews.title: Soft, smooth, buttery
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend using an exfoliating silicon washcloth which seems to help it remove excess oil/dirt after a long day outside or exposed to the elements. Just using my hands it doesn't feel as effective, however, I LOVE how soft and buttery this feels. I would almost tend to not describe it as a wash because that brings to mind to me soapy, foamy washes. Anyways, great product. My only wish is that the pumping mechanism was a bit more pronounced because it's relatively low to the bottle so you have to pump a few times to get the required amount.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Not good at removing makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the great reviews. I want impressed though. It doesnt take off makeup very well. I even washed twice. Making sure I really go over everything. There was still a lot left over. Personally I want something that will take off my makeup and be good for my skin. When I wash without makeup, it feels nice. Doesnt lather too much but its enough. If you use a separate product to remove your makeup, then this would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Santina

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have normal to dry skin (during the summer I get an oily T-zone) and this is the ONLY stuff that doesn't leave my face feeling kind of tight. I've using moisturizing face washes before, some far more expensive, and wanted to like them a lot. But this stuff is the truth. I was worried about using this due to being prone to acne break-outs and blackheads, but this doesn't bother it at all - there's no clogging pores and my skincare products sink right in. This has been upgraded to my permanent routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I can't get enough of this cleanser. I've tried more expensive brands, and this is my holy grail. I use it as a second cleanser after removing my makeup/sunscreen with an oil or balm cleanser, and then in the morning as my only cleanser. It's unscented and doesn't leave my face feeling dry. It's definitely not designed for taking off makeup, but you really should be using a makeup remover/oil cleanser for that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of consistent use with my prescription my acne has cleared up and my face has restored its moisture. I use the moisturizing cream for dry skin too works really well. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Winter Woods

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First Step in Any Skincare Routine
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the more I’m focused on making sure the products I use on my skin are actually doing something beneficial. Not just that they smell nice or feel luxurious, but that they’re actually improving my skin. This CeraVe face wash absolutely fits the bill. It contains all the buzzwords you’d want in a face wash- ceramides, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide, etc. My face is left feeling clean and moisturized. There’s no drying or tight sensation. No residue left behind. Just the perfect first step in my skincare routine.
customer_reviews.author: Blonderick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive acne-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin and hormonal acne breakouts. I use this cleanser in combination with Curology and an organic toner and it works better than any other cleanser I've tried. It doesn't dry out the skin and hydrates well without feeling greasy. I'm not the biggest fan of the consistency, it's like a liquid-y gel cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Great daily cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this for my son who really does not take care of his skin. Getting him to wash his face is a chore. This is not a "girlly" skin care product. It has no female scent and I noticed a big difference in his skin after he used it only one time!!!! Hopefully he will continue to use it! He is also using the Cerave moisturizing lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Worst face wash
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is AWFUL! I have washed my face 3 TIMES and it still doesn’t take off my makeup, and I don’t use very much makeup at all. I have used micelles water and cotton pads AFTER washing my face with this cerave wash and the cotton pad is completely full of makeup. It leaves your skin feeling like it has a slimy film left on it. Will never buy this stuff again.
customer_reviews.author: Kperalez85

customer_reviews.title: On the track to being great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Gets my face clean Nice durable bottle Don't agree with all the ingredients I was not compensated in any fashion for this review. I like to give open, honest, transparent feedback about products I try. I hope this review has been helpful to you. If it has, please click the 'Helpful' button to let myself and others know that it has helped you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Non comedogenic super important!
customer_reviews.text: I like how detailed the instructions are. They tell you the water should be lukewarm, put a little on your face first, and rub in circles away from your eyes. I just ate a burger and washed my face after when I feel very greasy. This made my skin feel so much better. I noticed my lips were chapped after and I needed chap stick, so maybe this isn't 100% top scorer on moisturizing. Just use moisturizer and chap stick and it's fine. I won't know for a while if this helps fix my skin irritation problems.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't dry out my skin like soap, and it doesn't clog my pores like other face cleansers I've tried. I also like that it is unscented, so I don't have to worry about allergic reactions. This hits the sweet spot for me as far as quality and price. I've tried similar but cheaper products by other brands and didn't like them. I've tried more expensive ones and didn't think they were enough better than the CeraVe to warrant the higher price. Nice product that I use every day.
customer_reviews.author: BASS!

customer_reviews.title: Good, but Found Better Out There
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extremely sensitive and prone to adult acne, especially mid-cycle, as well as turning brilliant shades of red when using many so-called gentle cleansers and lotions. My forehead flakes from dryness no matter how much moisturizer I use. I have tried Cetaphil and now CeraVe. I used CeraVe for a long time and was pretty pleased with the results until I found a new cleanser that was even better for my super sensitive skin type (Marcelle Ultra Gentle Cleansing Gel). I won't go back to CeraVe again, but it was cheaper than Marcelle.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: didn't like this product, not good for washing
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a face wash but it acts more like a facial cream than a facial cleanser wash. There is something off with the consistency of the soap. It is not soapy enough and does not clean well, just kind of covers everything up. This is a good brand so maybe I got a bad batch or something. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I've tried this product and not sure why I haven't sooner! I've been using CeraVe moisturizer for years and figured I should stick with the same brand for cleansing. I use this one at night and their foaming cleanser in the morning. This one does take getting used too at first because it feels like you are applying moisturizer, but it is actually deep cleaning and leaving your skin nice and soft for the night. This will definitely remain a part of my arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: R. Slipchenko

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have used this two times and I can already notice a difference in the moisture in my skin. My skin on my face is very dry and red. This product has already helped lessen the redness as well. This face cleanser is NOT a lathering type. It is more of a lotion/moisturizer type. I really enjoy it though. It is also great for sensitive skin like mine. It has not caused any irritation. It is also fragrant free, or at least I couldn't smell really anything. I would highly recommend this Face Wash. Remember though this is not a makeup remover. I would remove your makeup first then go back in and wash your face with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome along with a make up remover tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cleanser filled with all food nourishing ingredients. I see people writing doesn’t clean well or remove make up. No it’s not made to remove makeup. It’s to clean daily grim off and replenish moisture. You have to remove makeup first , I use an oil Make up remover. Then I use this with my Clarisonic. It works awesome. Even if you can get a Clarisonic on of those rubber battery operated face cleansers along with this will work wonders. You have to do this daily. I love all cerave products.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl loconte

customer_reviews.title: I SWEAR BY CERAVE!
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY THING THAT HAS EVER WORKED FOR MY DRY SENSITIVE SKIN! I have been using this for 5 years now, it cured all my acne, all my pore problems, and kept my skin from ever getting too dry or irritated. Try it and you will never go back to anything else!
customer_reviews.author: lals

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-aging cleaner and affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable and affective cleanser. I have dry, sensitive skin. This removes all makeup and leaves my skin moist. This is not drying or poor quality. Highly recommend this for anyone. Just because it’s not expensive doesn’t mean it is not a great anti-aging cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for your skin- I suffer from skin that reacts to any minor issue, so I will have breakouts pretty regularly. I have studied and been taught practical solutions for this- have seen multiple dermatologists, use toner and oils, and have tried tons of face washes. This is the only one I truly trust. Was unable to find this ANYWHERE locally, between target, walmart, cvs- everywhere, it was all sold out. This stuff is worth a try, and a good size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vivid

customer_reviews.title: Not the holy grail - works like clean and clear
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the fact that this is a dermatologist recommended product I expected better for this product. I would use it on my dry skin at night and in the morning I would have skin flaking already! I scent is not the best and I feel like there are other drugstore brands that make my face feel cleaner. After a day of makeup this product didn't do a great job taking off all the makeup either - I had to try this several times to actually get the makeup off. I was not impressed - would not purchase again unless the company made some changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan&Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but not a bad product.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting it to have a different texture and actually go on my face differently. It's very creamy and it's almost like putting lotion on. I want to wash my face and feel like it's clean but this didn't give me the "clean" feeling. It's just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I have sensitive skin and suffered from horrible acne in my teenage years. I've tried a lot, but most of the face washes I tried were too harsh, leaving skin dry and flakey, especially in the winter months. This seems to be a perfect balance, keeping my skins moisturized without feeling greasy, yet not overdrying. Pump and amount were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blickman

customer_reviews.title: Formula has changed - burns and made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this exclusively for over 10 years, and they must have just changed the formula. The ingredients list is in a different order (they have to be listed by which ingredient is used in the greatest amount first, followed by smaller amounts, in order), it smells like alcohol, and it burns the hell out of my skin, making me break out. I am so incredibly disappointed. I’m in the beauty business, and it was hard to find something that I knew would work, every time. SUCH a shame.
customer_reviews.author: SerenityNow

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Clinique mild facial soap for 20 years or more. I ordered this in a pinch because I was out of clinique and wanted to get something delivered in 2 days via prime. Glad I tried it. It cleans the skin well, at least for me. I wouldn't call it a moisturizing product, whichbis why I gave it 4 stars in that category. However it cleans well and doesnt leave my skin painfully tight afterwards. It doesnt burn my eyes either of it gets in them. Plus, the bottle lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shish

customer_reviews.title: This Product is Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of Cera Ve I have used and the first that I have ordered. I inherited the first from a girlfriend. I'm new to hydrating face washes but I'm sold on what it does to my skin. It not only delivers on the product description but it also informs me how well I shaved before applying it. I can feel all the spots I missed (I shave my entire head). Cera Ve has a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It feels almost like a moisturizer that you’re trying to cleanse your face with. It doesn’t foam up, or leave your face feeling dry when you rinse it, which some people aren’t used to. Took me time. Because I’m used to the soapy fragrant face cleansers that literally wash away all the good stuff leaving your face feeling dry, which I associated with “clean.” Thank god I’m don’t with that! No scent, moisturizing, and works great! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany E

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and no scent
customer_reviews.text: This is IT. My doctor recommended this cleanser for my daughter’s acne prone sensitive skin. Everyone in my house ended up loving it and we won’t use anything else. FYI, it goes on damp skin like a lotion and is rinsed off. There are no suds or bubbling. It is not soap; it is a lotion type cleanser. Great for sensitive skin and no scent
customer_reviews.author: Angelina S.

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I really like how soft this leaves my skin. I use it on my face and neck, and find it removes makeup and sunscreen without having to scrub a lot. I’ve learned that the ceramides contained in this face wash are really good for your skin, and I follow up with a serum or two and then also use the Cerave daily moisturizer (also with ceramides). It’s a big bottle but I will definitely re-order when I’ve finished with this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: EmilieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I found CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser brought back a healthy glow to my skin. Since Covid I wash my face many times a day. CeraVe helps keep my skin from drying out. I even think it reduced some fine lines from around my eyes. It's not greasy. It doesn't smell. It doesn't burn if you accidentally get some in your eyes, but do wash it out with lots of water anyway. I look forward to washing my face with CeraVe just before going to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: this is useless.
customer_reviews.text: I first would like to say I bought this same face wash about a year ago and I loved it, it actually foamed a little and cleaned. this bottle I received is a clear sticky goo and when I put it on my face it doesn’t foam or anything. after “washing my face” it doesn’t feel clean at all and i’ve since switched to a different face cleaner because this doesn’t even clean your face
customer_reviews.author: Autumn D

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry and sensitive skin and I love this product. I have heard people rave about this cleanser so I bought it when I ran out of my other cleansers. I have to say I was pleasantly surprised when I used it the first time. It really leaves your face feeling moisturized like there is a layer of lotion over it. It does a decent job on cleansing. I don't really wear makeup other than my eyebrows and it cleans it off well without using other cleansers.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: FAKE CLEANSER!! DO NOT BUY FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real cleanser you buy at the drugstores! Like another person mentioned it does not have the trademark symbol next to the name. This product does not cleanse your face right, it has a fragrance and it burns your face!!! DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing wash for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wash after reading multiple dermatologists' glowing reviews, and it does not disappoint! This daily wash cleans well, yet is moisturizing and reduces redness. It is so gentle on my sensitive skin, and there is almost no fragrance. I could literally tell the difference in my sensitive, combination, acne prone skin after one wash! There are also no parabens, petrochemicals, or other harmful preservatives (that I am aware of).
customer_reviews.author: Maria Braga

customer_reviews.title: Heavy cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This product does clean decently well, but if you like a squeaky clean after you wash your face you will hate this, I prefer to use this in the mornings when I only had moisturizers on during the night. I do not like it as a double cleanser. This does not foam at all, it feels more like a lotion when you rub it into your skin. I would recommend this for dry sensitive skin but not after makeup cleansing,
customer_reviews.author: Haemi Chang

customer_reviews.title: Must for affordable skincare
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why it said there’s scent but it’s fragrance free. I have sensitive acne prone skin. I’ve been using Cerave face wash for a year and it works great. My face feels clean but not that tight tugged feeling. I don’t feel like my skin was stripped of moisture like other cleansers. If you have dry skin then get this cleanser. If you have oily then get the foaming wash. I like how it’s dermatologist tested and recommended at a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne deunamuno

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this thinking is was as good as Cera Ve Foaming Facial Cleanser, not at all. This one was like a lotion, left my face feeling heavy and not feeling cleaned. I like Cera Ve's products but not this one, I had to discard the entire bottle and just buy the foaming cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My face was burning after each wash!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 1 star because it really did not agree to me it rather left my face burning every time I washed with it. I decided to purchase it because of all the positive reviews but I think if you have sensitive skin this may not be the best product for you.
customer_reviews.author: P Rams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for months now and and love it! It is exactly what it says it is, a hydrating cleanser. This product is NOT - a makeup remover - an oil remover - a heavy duty cleaning formula - for deep pore cleansing - exfoliating in any way This product IS - a hydrating cleanser - great for dry skin - super gentle - for after you've already gotten stubborn makeup off - calming - good for irritated or freshly exfoliated skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars from a very picky reviewer
customer_reviews.text: I always felt if a product didn’t lather, it wasn’t cleansing, but I’m very happy with this product. I have VERY dry skin. If I wash my face and don’t moisturize immediately, my face feels very tight, uncomfortable, maybe even a little itchy. Not with this stuff. I still follow up my wash with moisturizer, but I can tell my skin isn’t dried out like before. I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: HelloMiss

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry legitimate product!
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed in the reviews some people are concerned that this product is not legitimate I am here to tell you that it is 100% legitimate after L'Oréal bought cerave in 2017 they have announced on their official Twitter page and website that their formulas and packaging have changed having worked in the pharmaceutical industry for over 10 years I can tell you formulas and product packaging change often do not worry this is legitimate product
customer_reviews.author: Brock Wise

product_meta.title: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser | Moisturizing Non-Foaming Face Wash with Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramides & Glycerin | 16 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:16 Fl Oz

Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser is a unique formula that cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II). The formula also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture.

 * Fragrance-free
 * Non-comedogenic
 * Non-drying
 * Gentle, non-irritating



Key Ingredients:

 * MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration
 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture.
feature_bullets: [ DAILY FACE WASH ] Gentle cleansing lotion with hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and glycerin to help hydrate skin without stripping moisture. Removes face makeup, dirt, and excess oil, provides 24-hour hydration and leaves a moisturized, non-greasy feel

[NON-FOAMING CLEANSER ] Moisturizing facial cleanser with a lotion-like consistency feels smooth as it cleanses, even on sensitive, dry skin. Paraben-free, fragrance-free, soap-free, non-comedogenic, non-drying, and non-irritating. Certified by the National Eczema Association

[ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more
[ MULTI-USE SKINCARE ] Skin Cleanser for face and/or body and can be used as a hand wash. Suitable for daily cleansing morning (AM) and night (PM)
